pkgmetadata.longdescription: # TkReformReformed tkinter coding tool.## InstallationInstall TkReform via this command:```consolepip install tkreform```## UsageTkReform include two different styles of coding - `Imperative` and`Declarative`.For the former, you can view [this test script](tests/test.py), or[this test script](tests/test_declarative.py) for the latter.## LicensingTkReform is totally under `MIT License`. You can do everything underthis license.
